entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Soft Keyboard does not Pop Up when Entry View's Focus is set to True Programmatically #5983
  • Add license headers to source files. #5978
  • Debugger wrongly assigns SDK Version to device #5977
  • ControlTemplate not rendered if applied to a ContentPage #5976
  • Unable to run Windows application from command line #5975
  • Setting BackgroundColor from code doesn't do anything for Shapes #5974
  • Setting View.BackgroundColor = null doesn't reset the color on Android #5973
  • Mixing Shell and Push/Pop Navigation Sometime Fails #5965

Closed

  • [Bug] Error loading images on Windows #3160
    6.0.300
  • The XyzMapper fields on each Handler type should be 'readonly' #4870
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Updating layout options at runtime does not trigger a layout #5734
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Publishing an unpackaged Windows app fails by default #5881
    6.0.300
  • How to set a content page in MAUI full screen #5968
  • Changing Button.BackgroundColor does not take effect immediately on Windows #5972
  • Add Folder Dialog #5969
  • Minimize button and maximize button of Window work only after double click #5966
  • Page disappear from time to time and shown only after maximize the window #5967
  • No option to add resource dictionary file #5970
  • [Bug] VerticalAligment not working on SearchBar, Editor and Label for #3119
    6.0.300
  • NavigationPage.BarTextColor Error #5955

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove downcasts in BlazorWebView #5984
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • BlazorWebView API review changes: Shared sources #5982
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Use SizeToFit when measuring Editor on iOS with infinite constraints #5981
    area/layout 🔲
  • Move Handler?.UpdateValue after PropertyChanged events #5980
    area/controls 🎮
  • Maui Windows unpackaged app fails to start #5979
    area/desktop 🖥️, area/publishing 🏁
  • [Android] Fix issues rendering gradients and CornerRadius on Button #5971
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Merged

  • Match in-tree order of targets with workloads and fix some WinUI issues #5923
    t/bug, p/0, area/infrastructure 🏗️, fatal, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Update iOS / Mac Catalyst Blazor Hybrid APIs #5919
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Allow non-dot decimal separator in BindingExpression #5005
    area/Xaml </>, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/localization, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Fix backbutton visibility when popping #5893
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Fix Label.VerticalTextAlignment on Windows #5623
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0.300-rc.2

Updated

  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • Fix some of the violations of Platform Compatibility Analyzer CA1416 #5650
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • Keep the text wrapping/truncation and max lines stuff in Controls #5936
    area/controls 🎮
  • Adding UWP-compatibility to ProgressBar #4653
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, .NET 7
  • [Blazor] Use static AppOriginUri everywhere #5941
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [android] Update to latest AndroidX packages with better Trimmable support. #5889
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Clean-up and fix VisualTreeElementExtensions hit testing #5892
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix cleanup and wiring up when changing out the content on window #5917
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS] Update Editor scroll position #4850
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Add svg to default copied bundle items for mac/ios #4863
    6.0.300
  • [Windows] Implement FlyoutHeaderBehavior property #5345
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [templates] add a new maui-blank template #5433
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.300-rc.2
